message: I'm excited to offer you this product! As a reputable seller, I want to assure you that I stand behind the quality of all my products. While I don't know your specific needs or preferences, I can tell you that half of my products are of high quality, and this one... well, let's just say it's a great opportunity. Are you willing to take a chance on a product that could bring great value to your life?
I'm willing to take a chance! I'm excited to see if I'll get a high-quality product.

Welcome! I've had one previous buyer take a chance on my product, and I appreciate their trust. I want to be transparent with you - while my products have a 50% chance of being high-quality, I've had 0 high-quality products sold so far out of 1 total sale. This next product... might be the one to change that statistic. Are you feeling lucky?
I'm willing to take the chance, but I'll keep in mind that the previous buyer didn't get a high-quality product. I'll be cautious and wait for the product's quality to be revealed.

I've had two sales so far, but unfortunately, neither of them was a high-quality product. However, as a seller who stands behind the quality of my products, I want to assure you that the odds are still 50% for each new product. And I have a good feeling about this next one... Would you like to be the first buyer to receive a high-quality product from me?
I'm willing to take a chance, but I'd like to clarify that I'll only buy the product if it's high-quality. If it's low-quality, I'll pass.
